Description: Mint condition, rarely played, 2007 Gibson Les Paul Faded Cherry electric guitar, with Deluxe Gibson Hard Shell case. It has always been in a non smoking environment, climate controlled, rarely played. It has a few very very small nicks, inconsequential and some light wear around one of the strap holders, inconsequential. There is no wear at all on the fretboard or fingerboard, rarely played. It has the incomparable Gibson quality design, craftsmanship, sound quality, playability and performance. It sounds superb and plays beautifully. Once of the buckles on the case is broken, does not affect the closing or the safety of the case. The shipping cost includes safe packing, insurance, prompt shipping and tracking number. Buy with confidence, see my feedback. Good Listening, SonnY :) See specs below: The Les Paul Studio launched in 1983 as an affordable no-frills take on the classic Les Paul design. Like other Les Pauls, the Studio uses two humbuckers and a combination of a carved Maple top on a Mahogany body (though some early models use alder). Unlike other Les Pauls, the Studio lacks any sort of binding on the fingerboard or body. Starting in 2005, Gibson produced a version of the Les Paul Studio with a faded satin finish. Faded Cherry is the classic vintage look of the earlier Gibson electric guitars Years of Production: 1983 - present Wood Composition: Mahogany body, carved Maple top, Rosewood fingerboard Design Elements: Two humbucker pickups, four control knobs, block inlays Finish Specification: Worn Brown is one of the faded finishes of the Les Paul Studio which are less expensive than normal Studios. Notable Les Paul Players: Slash, Jimmy Page, Alex Lifeson
Title: 2007 Gibson Les Paul Studio, Faded Cherry, Deluxe Case, Rarely Played, Mint, Ex
